title: MD
biography: Girija Oak Godbole is an Indian actress who appears in Marathi and Hindi cinema and is best known for her performances in Taare Zameen Par (2007), Shor in the City (2010) and Jawan (2023).
aiSummary: Nivedita Gupta is a epidemiology - covid serosurveys specialist with an H-index of 110 at ICMR (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet Infectious Diseases, The Lancet, iScience. Based in India.
